Text: You have something to do, don't you?
The jet black figure closes in on the demon king.

The bluish-purple trail he leaves behind fades after
him with tremendous speed. Magic and fire clash in
the distance, causing shock waves that reach all the
way to the capital.

The man has too much faith in his own strength.
What a fool.
We'll see who the fool is soon enough.

Mordred, the Transcendent Knight and 9th member of
the Rounds. I don't believe I've had the pleasure.
we'd like to check our answers on a few things.
I told you to know your place.
The moment Mordred draws his sword,
The force advances, slicing behind Epsilon.

I see... So, this is the power of the Transcendent
Knight.

Indeed, my swordsmanship utilizes a blade unseen by
the naked eye. I suppose I should compliment you for
having dodged a single blow.

Claiming others' achievements and boasting about
them—that's typical behavior of the Cult, I suppose.

From your armor to your cloak, they're all
artifacts.

That sword fills my ears with the lament of the
smith for their dying homeland, who poured their
very life force into forging it. It's time for you to
return it!

As Mordred swings his sword, an invisible blade is
unleashed into the air.
Simultaneously, Epsilon also releases her blade.

Her magic blade counters the Invisible's slash,
approaching Mordred behind it.
I've never seen such an artifact before...!
Do not measure our Shadow Wisdom by your standards.

Now, reveal to us all that dusty old knowledge
of yours.
Otherwise, you may just be in for a world of pain.
Going around in circles won't do us any good!
The damage from the beasts is so severe...
That's the last one in the castle...!

When Rose casts her gaze towards the town, she sees
figures in jet black hunting beasts in the shadows.

They move in perfect harmony, running circles
around the foul creatures as they hunt them with
the speed and ferocity of a gale-force wind.
We have no choice but to rely on them...

Open up the underground area of the garden. Those
ruins are sturdy. We'll evacuate the people from the
castle there.

I will gather the knights and head to the capital.
At the very least, we must do everything we can
to rescue the citizens...

I understand your request. Please leave the
evacuation to me.
May your heart guide you in your actions.
